column1: Incorrect validation: button remains active when value is zero.
column26:
STR:

# Open Page limit orders [https://app.1inch.io/advanced/limit?network=1&src=WETH&dst=USDC|https://app.1inch.io/advanced/limit?network=1&src=WETH&dst=USDC|smart-link] 
# Connect *Metamask* Wallet.
# In the “*You pay*” field, Enter “{{0}}” as the amount.
# Check the state of the *Review Order* button.
# Close the authorization QR code window.

Result: The *Review Order* button is *active*, even though the entered amount is {{0}}.

Expected result: The *Review Order* button should remain *disabled* when the entered amount is {{0}}.

column1: Opening the swap page instead of the limit page via the link
column26:
STR:

# Open the limit orders page via the link [https://app.1inch.io/#/1/advanced/limit-order/1|https://app.1inch.io/#/1/advanced/limit-order/1|smart-link] 

Result: Opening the swap page instead of the limit page via the link.

Expected result: Opening page limit orders.

column1: Limit orders: Reopening the QR code after canceling wallet authorization in limit orders
column26:
STR: 

# Open Page limit orders [https://app.1inch.io/#/1/advanced/limit-order/1|https://app.1inch.io/#/1/advanced/limit-order/1|smart-link] 
# Click on the wallet connection button on the limit orders page.
# From the list of wallets, click on 1inch wallet.
# Close the authorization QR code window

Result: Reopening the QR code after canceling wallet authorization in limit orders.

Expected result: Displaying the limit orders page.
